content.rendered:
Directed by Harshavardhan Kulkarni

Written by Suman Adhikary. Akshat Ghildial. Harshavardhan Kulkarni

Cast Rajkummar Rao(Shardul Thakur). Bhumi Pednekar(Sumi Singh). Chum Darang(Rimjhim Jongkey). Sheeba Chaddha(Baby Thakur). Gulshan Devaiah(Guru Narayan). Deepak Arora(Kabir). Seema Pahwa(Shardul’s Tayi (as Seema Bhargava)). Nitesh Pandey(Prem Singh). Loveleen Mishra(Mrs. Prem Singh). Priyanka Charan(Rekha – Shardul’s Cousin). Shashi Bhushan(Anoop – Rekha’s Husband). Nidhi Bhati(Naaznin Baig). Vyom Yadav(Naman – Sumi’s Brother). Abhay Joshi(DSP). Durga Sharma(DSP’s Wife). Nutan Sinha(Nishita – Shardul’s Cousin). Archana Patel(Vineeta – Shardul’s Cousin). Apeksha Porwal(Komal). Chetan Dhawan(Rajeev Paddisetti aka Raju). Shireesh Dobriyal(Shardul’s Taya). Karuna Prakash(Priya – Sumi’s Mausi). Babita Anand(Kusum – Priya’s Friend). Ananya Gaur(Pihu). Palak Nauni(Diya). Sarita Rana(Mahila Thana SHO). Rajeev Shukla(Adoption Officer). Mushtaq Khan(Sharma Uncle). Baljinder Kaur(Sharma Aunty). Krishan Kumar(Constable Sirohi). Mitisha Arora(Sarita – Shardul’s Cousin). Aarti Shahi(Udita – Shardul’s Cousin). Sangeeta Kimothi(Lady Constable). Ritesh Singh(Young Constable). Fasi Khan(Vineeta’s Husband). Vishal Sharma(Nishita’s Husband). Abhinav Goyal(Udita’s Husband). Atul Verma(Sarita’s Husband). Pradeep Sharma(Chacha Ji). Seema Sharma(Chachi Ji). Shiven Basnet(Groom 2 Wedding). Babita Anant(Kusum). Navneet Gairola(a Protestor). Asli Suhail(Company’s manager)

Languages Hindi

Producers Ameet Dhanwani. Vineet Jain. Himanshu Joshi. Amit Mehta. Yogendra Mogre. Amrita Pandey. Anup Pandey. Nishant Radhakrishnan. Yogiraj Shetty. Chavi Sirohi.

Production Junglee Pictures
